# Flex



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                                               | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | Default        |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `alignContent`   | `align-content`   | This aligns a flex container's individual lines when there is extra space in the cross-axis, similar to how "justifyContent" aligns individual items along the main axis. | `"center" \| "flex-end" \| "flex-start" \| "space-around" \| "space-between" \| "space-evenly" \| "stretch" \| BreakpointValues<"flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "center" \| "stretch" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly">` | `'stretch'`    |
| `alignItems`     | `align-items`     | Defines how the flex items are aligned along the cross axis.                                                                                                              | `"baseline" \| "center" \| "flex-end" \| "flex-start" \| "stretch" \| BreakpointValues<"flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "center" \| "baseline" \| "stretch">`                                                                                   | `'stretch'`    |
| `direction`      | `direction`       | Defines the direction of the main and cross axis. The default "row" defines the main axis as horizontal left to right.                                                    | `"column" \| "column-reverse" \| "row" \| "row-reverse" \| BreakpointValues<"row" \| "row-reverse" \| "column" \| "column-reverse">`                                                                                                         | `'row'`        |
| `display`        | `display`         | Defines the flex containers content flow if 2 or more containers are siblings of each other.                                                                              | `"block" \| "inline" \| BreakpointValues<"block" \| "inline">`                                                                                                                                                                               | `'block'`      |
| `justifyContent` | `justify-content` | Defines how the flex items are aligned along the main axis.                                                                                                               | `"center" \| "flex-end" \| "flex-start" \| "space-around" \| "space-between" \| "space-evenly" \| BreakpointValues<"flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "center" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly">`                           | `'flex-start'` |
| `wrap`           | `wrap`            | If set, overflowing elements will wrap to a new line.                                                                                                                     | `"nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse" \| BreakpointValues<"nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse">`                                                                                                                                             | `'nowrap'`     |
